direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mrs. Sennett, how are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some days I think i'll be okay, others, well I have to force myself even to get out of bed, I know it's crazy, but sometimes I think he's just away at summer camp. How's Vada?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh she's doing much better. Ahh she's just inside. (walks over to entrance)
direction.name: direction

result.heading: A CAFE IN TOWN, HARRY IS EATING, MRS

direction.raw_text: ! Vada, who is inside talking to someone, hears and comes outside
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mrs. Sennett. (she runs and gives her a hug)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vada. I've been wanting to come over to see you, (she reaches inside her purse and gets out something, it is Vada's mood ring) Thomas J had this on him, I thought you might like to have it. Vada slides the ring onto her finger, the ring is BLUE You were such a good friend to him, I hope you'll still come by and visit me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will, I promise. Mrs. Sennett looks at Harry as if to say good-bye, and then walks off slowly
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mrs. Sennett. (she stops and turns around to look at Vada) Thomas J will be all right, my mother will take care of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you Vada. She then turns and walks off
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIXLER MR. BIXLER (reading from book) Encased in talent, like a uniform, the rank of every poet, is well known. They can amaze us like a thunderstorm, or die so young, or live for years alone. My advice to you on our last class, be a thunderstorm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What exactly do you mean by that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, be dangerous (Vada enters the back of the room) And unpredictable. And make a lot of noise. Mr. Bixler sees Vada
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vada. As Vada is noticed, she goes around getting hugged by everyone
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, we missed you man! Gimme a hug! Vada gives Justin a hug, she then proceeds towards Mr. Bixler
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was hoping you'd stop by today. Vada and Mr. Bixler hug each other
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't stay, I just came to read my poem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'd love to hear it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weeping willow with your tears running down, Why do you always weep and frown, Is it because he left you one day, Is it because he could not stay, On your branches he would swing, Do you long for the happiness that they would bring, He found shelter in your shade, He thought his laughter would never fade, Weeping willow stop your tears, There is something to calm your fears, You think death as if you forever part, But I know he'll always be in your heart. There is a long pause as it sinks in, everybody remains silent, then just before the scene changes, the Temptations song "My Girl" begins to play
direction.name: direction
